about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a Software Development student specialized in Frontend, with experience in web development for businesses. I am interested in creating attractive, functional, and optimized interfaces to enhance the user experience.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.parrafo1: Quiz website focused on world history that determines which ancient genius your knowledge compares to.
projects.parrafo2: Web development business carried out during the years 2024 - 2025.
projects.parrafo3: Website developed for a client with a receptive tourism company in Miami, includes language control, transfer system, and apartment search index.
